entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
